com.estimote.sdk.cloud

Class EstimoteCloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.estimote.sdk.cloud.EstimoteCloud

  • public class EstimoteCloud
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for interaction with Estimote Cloud.

    You need first to provide App id and token. You can find your App ID and App Token in the Apps section of the Estimote Cloud.

    This object is a singleton. You can obtain instance to it by calling getInstance().

    Usage: 

       EstimoteSDK.initialize(applicationContext, appId, appToken);
   EstimoteCloud.getInstance().fetchBeaconDetails(beaconMacAddress, callback);

      void fetchNearableDetails(java.lang.String identifier, CloudCallback<NearableInfo> callback)
      Fetches public details (like color or type) of a nearable from Estimote Cloud.

      • fetchBeaconDetails

        public void fetchBeaconDetails(MacAddress macAddress,
                      CloudCallback<BeaconInfo> callback)
        Fetches details of a beacon identified by its MAC address from Estimote Cloud.
        Parameters:
        macAddress - Beacon's MAC address.
        callback - Callback to be invoked after details are fetched.

      • fetchBeaconDetails

        public void fetchBeaconDetails(java.util.UUID uuid,
                      int major,
                      int minor,
                      CloudCallback<BeaconInfo> callback)
        Fetches details of a beacon identified by its proximity UUID, major and minor numbers.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Beacon's UUID.
        major - Beacon's major number.
        minor - Beacon's minor number.
        callback - Callback to be invoked after details are fetched.

      • fetchNearableDetails

        public void fetchNearableDetails(java.lang.String identifier,
                        CloudCallback<NearableInfo> callback)
        Fetches public details (like color or type) of a nearable from Estimote Cloud.
        Parameters:
        identifier - Nearable's identifier (Nearable.identifier).
        callback - Callback to be invoked after details are fetched.
